term.title: Slater determinant

item.text: The determinantal representation of many-electron wavefunction Ψ which conforms to the requirement of the antisymmetry principle.

sources.item: PAC, 1999, 71, 1919. 'Glossary of terms used in theoretical organic chemistry' on page 1962 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199971101919)
